scripts.submit: bestzip submit.zip src/* haxelib.json readme.md extraParams.hxml && haxelib submit submit.zip && rm submit.zip
scripts.publish:js: ncp build/js dist/js && git-directory-deploy --directory dist/js --branch js-$(node version.js)
scripts.publish:php: ncp build/php dist/php && git-directory-deploy --directory dist/php --branch php-$(node version.js)
scripts.version:php: git tag -a $(node version.js) -m $(node version.js) $(git log -n 1 --pretty=format:%H php-$(node version.js)) && git push origin php-$(node version.js)
